name: Capitalist Cafe
description: In the full release, you will embody an aspiring café owner. You were given a small loan to start a café amongst the mega-corporations of Poo York City. In this corporatist society, only the best of the best flourish, while the rest starve waiting for another chance. Can you survive the first week of business and provide customers with 5-star quality food? Test your memory, reflexes, and timing with minigames, and strategize how you spend your stars on new recipes. Be wary of local critics, Karens, and survive the hurdle on Day 7 of your adventure.
